content:
Disability is not 
 inability 
 
 Agnes Mabururu 
 English 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 This is Agnes. 
 
 She is my teacher. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 1  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Agnes uses crutches 
 
 to walk. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 2  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 This is Metobo. 
 
 He is my favourite 
 
 radio DJ. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 3  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 He has problems with his 
 
 eyes. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 My neighbour is Mora. 
 
 
 
 She is a farmer. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 5  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Mora canot hear. 
 
 
 
 She speaks using Sign 
 
 language. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 6  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 This is Osero. 
 
 He is the best socer 
 
 player at my schol. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 7  
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Osero has no hands. 
 
 
 
 But he scores many 
 
 goals for our team! 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 8
